channel.title: Sections on Himani Arora, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on Himani Arora, Ph.D.

item.description: Welcome to my website. I am a postdoctoral researcher at the Helmholtz Research Center HZDR. I received my Ph.D. in Physics from TU Dresden in 2020. My research is about ultra-thin semiconductors and their electronic applications. Curriculum Vitae (Version November 2020)
Email: himani.arora.06@gmail.com Github: himani-arora-ha ORCID: Visit my profile here Google Scholar: Visit my profile here
* This website is cloned from Jonathan Old. You can find the source code on my Github repository. Please feel free to copy it for your own website.
